definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: We found people wandering like ghosts through the ruins .
sentences.chinese: 孤魂野鬼一樣的人們在廢墟里遊蕩。

sentences.english: On the day succeeding the fire, I visited the ruins.
sentences.chinese: 失火的第二天，我去查看那堆廢墟。

sentences.english: There is no hospitable place to hide amongst all the debris and devastation.
sentences.chinese: 在這一片殘骸和廢墟中，沒有好客的地方可以躲躲。

sentences.english: I hear the elder sisters read aloud in the ruins
sentences.chinese: 我聽見廢墟里姐姐的書聲朗朗。

sentences.english: The ruins were soon covered by thick forests.
sentences.chinese: 廢墟很快被茂盛的樹林所籠蓋。

sentences.english: And poking around in ruins would never be quite the same enjoyable pastime.
sentences.chinese: 再到廢墟中徒步旅行時就不會象過去一樣悠然自得。

sentences.english: A king-size conundrum ruins ruined, twins who are both first.
sentences.chinese: 一座特大王室廢墟遭到摧毀，都是第一的雙胞胎。

sentences.english: Children picked through the debris to uncover school bags and torn books.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在廢墟中找尋上學的書包和殘破的書本。

sentences.english: But I concluded that no one ruin is like another.
sentences.chinese: 但我斷定沒有一個廢墟與另外的是相像的。

sentences.english: A purple car is partially submerged in mud. The piles of debris reach two metres high.
sentences.chinese: 一輛紫色的汽車半掩在淤泥中，廢墟堆了足有兩米高。

sentences.english: Lorekeep, the great city of necromantic magic, lies in ruins .
sentences.chinese: 學識要塞，偉大的巫術魔法之城，現在已是一片廢墟。

sentences.english: Xu Darong success arrived, will liu town and version was pulled out of the ruins.
sentences.chinese: 徐大榮成功趕到，將柳時鎮和小姜救出了廢墟。

sentences.english: The fires still smolder beneath the ruins.
sentences.chinese: 火仍然在廢墟下面燃燒着。

sentences.english: What is it about “ruins” that you find so alluring?
sentences.chinese: 關於“廢墟”，什麼會使你你覺得很有誘惑力？

sentences.english: She stands in the ruins, hair loose and paralyzed, awaiting her punishment.
sentences.chinese: 她站在廢墟里，頭髮鬆散蓬亂，等待着對她的懲罰。

sentences.english: Weve created a beautiful new building from out of an old ruin.
sentences.chinese: 我們從廢墟上建了一幢漂亮的新樓。

definition: left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
